Aux.OnCommand:
%function(self)
GAMESTATE:SetExternal(0,TwitchChatVS.flag) GAMESTATE:SetExternal(1,1) GAMESTATE:SetExternal(61,1) -- vote kill button
self:queuecommand('Update')
end
Aux.UpdateCommand:
%function(self)
if GAMESTATE:GetExternal(61)==0 then
SCREENMAN:SetNewScreen('ScreenTitleMenu')
end
end
